Affordable pricing for your use case

Ready to take your online course publishing business to the next level? Sign up for a free trial and discover how Xepho can help you create, market, and sell with ease.

Starter

Creators can share their knowledge with a broad audience without any upfront cost.

£0

/Month
What's included
  • Marketplace Account
  • No Monthly Fees
  • Revenue Sharing
  • Unlimited Courses
  • Basic Course Creation
Start For Free

Premium

Individual course creators who wis to own a landing page and to establish their brand and showcase their courses.

£9

/Month
What's included
  • Personal subsite
  • Monthly Subscription
  • Enhanced course management tools
  • Limited Platform Branding
  • Online 24/7 support
Choose Plan
Learn More

Academy

Tailored for educational institutions and organizations with multiple instructors.

£29

/Month
What's included
  • Team Account
  • Monthly Subscription
  • Custom domain support
  • Advanced branding
  • Bulk enrollment
  • Multi-instructor support
  • Comprehensive analytics
  • Online 24/7 support
Choose Plan
Learn More

Enterprise

A flexible plan for large organizations and enterprises with specific needs. Customize your features and pricing to suit your requirements. Ideal for schools, academies, and training centers.

Custom

  • Team Account
  • Monthly Subscription
  • Custom domain support
  • Advanced branding
  • Bulk enrollment
  • Multi-instructor support
  • Comprehensive analytics
  • Online 24/7 support
  • Account Manager
  • Whitelabel
Contact Sales

Get Started with Xepho Today

Experience the Xepho difference and see why thousands of entrepreneurs trust us to power their online businesses. Whether you’re just starting or looking to scale, Xepho has the tools and support you need to achieve your goals.
